data.title: Felici Curiositate. Studies In Latin Literature And Textual Criticism From Antiquity To The Twentieth Century. In Honour Of Rita Beyers [PDF] [790l2is3fpl0]
data.meta_description: Felici Curiositate. Studies In Latin Literature And Textual Criticism From Antiquity To The Twentieth Century. In Honour Of Rita Beyers [PDF] [790l2is3fpl0]. The papers collected in this Festschrift in honour of Rita Beyers, Professor Emerita of Latin at the University of Antwe...
